name: $who
desc: Returns: The individual or organization attesting to information.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The individual or organization attesting to information.

name: $onBehalfOf
desc: Returns: When the who is asserting on behalf of another (organization or individual).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: When the who is asserting on behalf of another (organization or individual).

name: $communicationMethod
desc: Returns: The method by which attested information was submitted/retrieved (manual; API; Push).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The method by which attested information was submitted/retrieved (manual; API; Push).

name: $date
desc: Returns: The date the information was attested to.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date the information was attested to.

name: $sourceIdentityCertificate
desc: Returns: A digital identity certificate associated with the attestation source.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A digital identity certificate associated with the attestation source.

name: $proxyIdentityCertificate
desc: Returns: A digital identity certificate associated with the proxy entity submitting attested information on behalf of the attestation source.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A digital identity certificate associated with the proxy entity submitting attested information on behalf of the attestation source.

name: $proxySignature
desc: Returns: Signed assertion by the proxy entity indicating that they have the right to submit attested information on behalf of the attestation source.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Signed assertion by the proxy entity indicating that they have the right to submit attested information on behalf of the attestation source.

name: $sourceSignature
desc: Returns: Signed assertion by the attestation source that they have attested to the information.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Signed assertion by the attestation source that they have attested to the information.
